content.title: MMKY-New Tank Excavation Under Brackish Water Aquaculture
content.beneficiary: Farmers and entrepreneurs in coastal districts of Odisha
content.details: The State plan scheme 'MMKY-New Tank Excavation Under Brackish Water Aquaculture' was launched to promote farmers and entrepreneurs to take up Brackish water aquaculture. The scheme aims to enhance brackish water shrimp and fish production, improve livelihoods and income of coastal communities, and increase shrimp/fish exports from the State.
benefits: Subsidy assistance for excavation of new brackish water ponds
Training and skill development programs for beneficiaries
eligibility: Resident of Odisha with identity and residential proof including Aadhaar Card
Bank account in the beneficiary's name in Odisha
Requisite land free from all encumbrances
Eligibility for a maximum of up to 2.00 Ha water spread area
exclusions: Beneficiaries who have received subsidy during the last three years are not eligible
Transgender/PwD category shall not be considered for PMMSY funds
content.application_process: Online and Offline. Applicants must register on the Go-Sugam Portal and submit requisite documents.
documents_required: CAA Form-1 for registration of proposed land for brackish water aquaculture
Copy of the Lease Agreement (if required)
Affidavit for joint ownership ROR sworn before the Executive Magistrate
Certificate of disability for differently-abled persons
Certificate of identity as transgender person issued by the District Magistrate

faqs.question: What is ‘MMKY-New Tank Excavation Under Brackish Water Aquaculture' Scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme aims to encourage brackish water aquaculture among farmers and entrepreneurs in coastal districts of Odisha.

faqs.question: What are the main objectives of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Enhancing brackish water shrimp and fish production, improving livelihoods, and increasing shrimp/fish exports.

faqs.question: Where is the scheme implemented?
faqs.answer: In the coastal districts of Odisha.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from the MMKY-New Tank Excavation scheme?
faqs.answer: Farmers and entrepreneurs in the coastal districts of Odisha.

faqs.question: How is the subsidy calculated for beneficiaries under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The subsidy is calculated based on the actual cost incurred by the beneficiary.
